class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiTradingPartner
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Trading Partners. The EDI partners are any business organization; line operators, railroads, government agencies, trucking companies, etc

property.name: ediptnrName
property.meta: Name of the EDI Trading Partner

many-to-one.name: ediptnrComplex
many-to-one.meta: Partners are set up by complex.

property.name: ediptnrIsRetired
property.meta: The column denotes whether the partner is retired or not

property.name: ediptnrLifeCycleState
property.meta: public

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiMailbox
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Mailboxes of the trading partners. It stores communication details to be used for data post/extract

many-to-one.name: edimlbxComplex
many-to-one.meta: Mailboxes are set up by complex.

property.name: edimlbxName
property.meta: Name of this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxSenderQualifier
property.meta: EDI Mailbox Sender Qualifier

property.name: edimlbxSenderId
property.meta: EDI Mailbox Sender Id

property.name: edimlbxReceiverQualifier
property.meta: EDI Mailbox Receiver Qualifier

property.name: edimlbxReceiverId
property.meta: EDI Mailbox Receiver Id

property.name: edimlbxLastInterchange
property.meta: Sequence of the Last Interchange sent/received from this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxLastMessageNbr
property.meta: Last Message Reference Number

property.name: edimlbxDirection
property.meta: Direction of this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxDirectory
property.meta: Directory of this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxCommType
property.meta: Communication Type used by the Trading Partner for this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxCommAddr
property.meta: Communication Address (IP/email) used by the Trading Partner for this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxCommUserId
property.meta: Communication User ID used by the Trading Partner for this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxCommPasswd
property.meta: Communication Password used by the Trading Partner for this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxCommFolder
property.meta: Communication Folder given by the Trading Partner for this EDI Mailbox

property.name: edimlbxLifeCycleState
property.meta: public

property.name: edisessName
property.meta: Name of this EDI Session

many-to-one.name: edisessComplex
many-to-one.meta: Sessions are set up by complex.

property.name: edisessDesc
property.meta: Description of the EDI Session

property.name: edisessMessageClass
property.meta: Basic EDI Message Class

property.name: edisessDirection
property.meta: Direction of this EDI Session

property.name: edisessLastRunTimestamp
property.meta: Date time of the last run for this EDI Session

property.name: edisessLastRunStatus
property.meta: Status of the Last Run for this EDI Session

property.name: edisessFileExt
property.meta: Extension of the file generated by this EDI Session

property.name: edisessDelimeter
property.meta: Delimiter of the edi file used in this EDI Session

property.name: edisessTranCntlNbr
property.meta: Last Transaction Set Control number used in this EDI Session

property.name: edisessMsgSeqNbr
property.meta: EDI message sequence number which gets incremented for every extract of this session

property.name: edisessInterNumChkFlag
property.meta: A flag which says whether Interchange number should be validated or not for Inbound EDI

many-to-one.name: edisessPredicate
many-to-one.meta: Predicate defining entities processed by this EDI Session

property.name: edisessIsAutoPosted
property.meta: The column denotes whether this link is AutoPosted or not

property.name: edisessLifeCycleState
property.meta: public

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiSetting
class.meta: Domain entity representing a configured Setting for an EDI Session

property.name: edistngConfigId
property.meta: ConfigId of the Config associated with this setting

many-to-one.name: edistngSession
many-to-one.meta: EDI Session to which this EdiSetting pertains

property.name: edistngValue
property.meta: Config setting value, encoded into a String

property.name: edifltrName
property.meta: Scoped EDI Filter name

property.name: edifltrDirection
property.meta: Direction of this EDI Filter

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiFilterEntry
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI EdiFilter Entry

property.name: edifltrenFieldId
property.meta: EDI Filter Entry Field Id

property.name: edifltrenFromValue
property.meta: EDI Filter Entry From Value

property.name: edifltrenToValue
property.meta: EDI Filter Entry To Value

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiSessionFilter
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Session Filter

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiMessageMap
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Message Map

property.name: edimapId
property.meta: EDI Message Map ID

property.name: edimapDirection
property.meta: Direction of this EDI Message Map

property.name: edimapDic
property.meta: EDI Message Map Dictionary File

property.name: edimapIsBuiltIn
property.meta: True if this is a built-in map

property.name: edimapFile
property.meta: EDI Message Map File

property.name: edimapDesc
property.meta: Description of this EDI Message Map

property.name: edimapLifeCycleState
property.meta: public

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiMessageType
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Message Type

property.name: edimsgIdVerRel
property.meta: EDI Message Type ID, Version, Release Nbr

property.name: edimsgId
property.meta: EDI Message Type ID

property.name: edimsgClass
property.meta: EDI Message Type class

property.name: edimsgStandard
property.meta: EDI Message Type standard

property.name: edimsgVersion
property.meta: EDI Message Type version

property.name: edimsgReleaseNbr
property.meta: EDI Message Type release nbr

property.name: edimsgAgency
property.meta: EDI Message Type responsible agency

property.name: edimsgDescription
property.meta: EDI Message Type description

property.name: edimsgLifeCycleState
property.meta: public
The column denotes whether the message type is active

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiReleaseMap
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Release Map

property.name: edirelmapEdiCode
property.meta: EDI Release Map ID

property.name: edirelmapIsHold
property.meta: The column denotes whether the Map is hold or not

property.name: edirelmapUnitMatch
property.meta: The column denotes how the correct Unit is matched when posting the EDI

property.name: edirelmapReleaseCarrierMatch
property.meta: The column denotes whether the Map is matched by Carrier name or carrier voyage number

property.name: edirelmapMatchQty
property.meta: The column denotes how to match Quantity for BL release

property.name: edirelmapModifyQty
property.meta: Whether the quantity received in release message refers to released/held quantity

property.name: edirelmapFlagTypeId
property.formula: (SELECT flgtyp.id FROM srv_flag_types flgtyp WHERE flgtyp.gkey = flag_gkey)
property.meta: flag type Id

property.name: edirelmapIsQuantityNegative
property.meta: The column indicates whether the Quantity is to be considered negative or not

property.name: edirelmapLifeCycleState
property.meta: public

property.name: edisessmlbxIsPrimary
property.meta: The column denotes whether this link is Primary or not

property.name: edisessmlbxLifeCycleState
property.meta: public

property.name: edibatchNbr
property.meta: Batch Number

property.name: edibatchMsgRefNbr
property.meta: Message reference number received in inbound message.

property.name: edibatchState
property.meta: State of this EDI Batch (loaded, parsed, posted, extracted, unloaded, sent, etc.)

property.name: edibatchStatus
property.meta: Status of this EDI Batch (complete, warnings, errors)

property.name: edibatchSegmentCount
property.meta: Number of edi_segments found in interchange for this batch

property.name: edibatchReprocessCount
property.meta: Number of edi_reprocess jobs executed for this batch

property.name: edibatchTransactionCount
property.meta: Number of bookings, bls, containers, etc. found in interchange

property.name: edibatchNotes
property.meta: Notes describing this batch

property.name: edibatchAdditionsOnly
property.meta: Additions Only for Manual Stowplan posting

property.name: edibatchPositionsOnly
property.meta: Positions Only for Manual Stowplan posting

property.name: edisegSeq
property.meta: Edi Sequence

property.name: edisegStatus
property.meta: Edi Status

property.name: edisegSegment
property.meta: Edi Segment

property.name: edisegMsgSeq
property.meta: Message sequence within interchange

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiBatchProcess
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Batch Process

property.name: ediprocSequence
property.meta: Sequence that increments monotonically

property.name: ediprocId
property.meta: Process ID (extract, load, post, parse, etc.)

property.name: ediprocStatus
property.meta: Status of this EDI Batch Process (complete, warnings, errors)

property.name: ediprocRecordsActual
property.meta: Actual number of segments or transactions processed depending on nature of process

property.name: ediprocRecordsTotal
property.meta: Total number of segments or transactions to be processed depending on nature of process

property.name: ediprocExecutionNode
property.meta: The unique name used to define the node in the cluster that will execute the process.

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiTransaction
class.meta: CREATE INDEX edi_tran_crststat_edib_idx on edi_transaction (created, status) include (edibat_gkey);

property.name: editranSeqWithinInterchange
property.meta: Sequence within Interchange, Helpful to get post entire Interchange in order

property.name: editranSeqWithinBatch
property.meta: Sequence within Batch

property.name: editranDoc
property.meta: XML document containing one commitable EDI transaction

property.name: editranAckType
property.meta: The column denotes whether the ack is ACCEPTED/REJECTED

property.name: editranAckCount
property.meta: Acknowledgement Count, Integer to track count

property.name: editranControlNbr
property.meta: Transaction control number incremented for each outbound transaction bound to respective edi session

property.name: editranSetNbr
property.meta: Transaction control number received in inbound message.

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiKeyword
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Transaction Keyword

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiError
class.meta: Domain entity representing EDI Process Error

many-to-one.name: edijobschComplex
many-to-one.meta: EDI Job schedule is set up by complex.

property.name: edijobschIsScheduled
property.meta: The column denotes whether the job is scheduled or not

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiPostingRule
class.meta: Describes the Posting Logic for a particular MessageClass and PropertyGroup

many-to-one.name: prulComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which this PostingRule belongs.

property.name: prulEdiMessageClass
property.meta: Message Class to which this rule applies

property.name: prulPropertyGroup
property.meta: Property Group to which this rule applies

many-to-one.name: prulMapping
many-to-one.meta: Top node in a EntityMappingPredicate tree defining the rules.

class.name: com.navis.edi.business.entity.EdiSample
class.meta: Argo-standard EDI XML data for testing purposes

property.name: edismplMsgClass
property.meta: Message Class (STOWPLAN, etc.)

property.name: edismplXml
property.meta: XML payload

many-to-one.name: edijobComplex
many-to-one.meta: EDI Job schedule is set up by complex.

property.name: edijobReprocessCount
property.meta: Number of times the reprocess job runs
